name: Dynamic Fitness
description: Bold and dynamic UI with high energy and movement, inspired by sports brands.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Bold, aggressive, and energetic. Use ALL CAPS headings and tight letter spacing. Motion is key.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Dark mode default. high contrast black and white with neon orange/red accents.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Sharp edges (0px radius). Full-screen imagery. Large, bold typography. Avoid subtle shadows.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: Ensure text is legible against dark backgrounds.
